DEMO_821_MSG_010:
̂Hoakari's Shard... Anses and Birdie first met each
other because of the Sky God, actually...
ā
DEMO_821_MSG_020:
̂Anses was desperately seeking a partner that could 
Sky Ride, and encountered Birdie in the process.
ā
DEMO_821_MSG_030:
̂Birdie used to have a real bad attitude. He had a big
ego that landed him in all kinds of trouble.
ā
DEMO_821_MSG_040:
̂However, befriending Anses was perhaps the best choice he'd ever make.
ā
DEMO_821_MSG_050: ̂Is there really a special bond you men form with each other? I never understood it, but Birdie sure idolized Anses.
DEMO_821_MSG_060:
̂Anyhow, due to their combined efforts, they were able
to get what we needed to get the initial Planet Seed.
DEMO_821_MSG_070:
̂Alright, that should do it... the Planet Seed will
now utilize Hoakari's Shard to enable creation of the atmosphere.
